title: 10 QQ for the Dalai Lama[2006]DVDrip(XviD)] Ekolb
description:
One man&#039;s journey through the northern Himalayas. How do you reconcile a commitment to non-violence when faced with violence? Why do the poor often seem happier than the rich. In this documentary, director Rick Ray has the opportunity to ask the Dalai Lama questions that directly relate to society&#039;s current issues.
